title: ‘We look forward to the film after being on our own odyssey’ - Primary pupils’ exhibition features art of Ancient Greece
description: Dyke Primary School pupils have collaborated with Moray Art Centre artists on new exhibition The Odyssey: Journeys Home.

title: Surya Grahan: Interesting legends about solar eclipse in six ancient civilisations
description: Long before astronomy offered answers, ancient civilisations explained solar eclipses through many interesting myths or legends. Read here how these stories turn a rare sky event into powerful cultural mythology.

title: Beautiful castle with stunning gardens is home to ancient 'scientific marvel'
description: A stunning castle in Faithful County is home to a world-famous scientific marvel surrounded by lush gardens with secret waterfalls and a lovely café.

title: 11 Ashbourne Shrovetide photos as ancient ball game returns to Derbyshire town
description: The Up'ards and Down'ards are ready to battle it out once again

title: 2,000-year-old Tamil-Brahmi inscriptions found in Egyptian pyramids, rewriting ancient maritime history
description: Around 30 inscriptions, the majority in Tamil-Brahmi, have been identified in Egypt’s Valley of the Kings, offering striking new evidence of the global reach of ancient Tamil civilisation and confirming that Tamils travelled and lived in Roman Egypt between the 1st and 3rd centuries CE.
